Param¶

The Param class in param.py is responsible for getting, setting and updating the paramaters which are accessible using sheet.py to get information from your csv or Google Sheet.

class dap.param.Param(sheet, config=None)¶

Class which allows communication with Google sheet or csv to enable request of paramaters and update of status

Parameters:
  • sheet (Sheet) – A Sheet object containing paramaters
  • config (Config) – A Config object containing the configuration settings
checkForDBErrors(timeout=2880)¶

Checks the database to see if there is a paramater set failed. If a paramater set failed then it allows it to be ran again.

Parameters:timeout (float) –

Note

This is not currently implimented properly

Returns:None if no set failed or a dictionary containing that set
parameterFailed(id)¶

Mark a paramater set as failed.

Parameters:id (string) –
Returns:The paramater set with new meta data or none if no set found
parameterSuccessful(id)¶

Mark a paramater set as successful.

Parameters:id (string) –
Returns:The paramater set with new meta data or none if no set found
requestParameters()¶

Get the next paramater set

Returns:Returns a dictionary with the paramater set. Returns None if one isn’t available or the number of runs has exceted the set amount.
updateStatus(id, status)¶

Update the paramater set status to the given value

Parameters:
  • id (string) –
  • status (string) –
Returns:

The paramater set with new meta data or none if no set found
